languages.text: "Сейчас — так и быть. Но когда мы вернемся в Простор, возвращайся к образу принцессы и не позорь мое имя".

traits.locale_text: "Сейчас — так и быть. Но когда мы вернемся в Простор, возвращайся к образу принцессы и не позорь мое имя".

languages.text: "Indulge yourself for now. But when we are back in the Expanse, you will return to your princess guise and not disgrace my name."
languages.original_text: "Сейчас — так и быть. Но когда мы вернемся в Простор, возвращайся к образу принцессы и не позорь мое имя".

traits.locale_text: "Indulge yourself for now. But when we get back to the Expanse, return to the princess character and do not discredit my name."
"Indulge yourself for now. But when we get back to the Expanse, return to the princess character and do not discredit my name."
"Indulge yourself for now. But when we are back in the Expanse, you will return to your princess guise and not disgrace my name."
"Indulge yourself for now. But when we are back in the Expanse, you will return to your princess guise and not disgrace my name."
"Indulge yourself for now. But when we are back in the Expanse, you will return to your princess guise and not disgrace my name."

languages.text: “你现在尽可以放纵。不过，等我们回到科罗努斯扩区之后，你要重新戴上你公主的面具，不要让我的名字蒙羞。”
languages.original_text: "Indulge yourself for now. But when we are back in the Expanse, you will return to your princess guise and not disgrace my name."

traits.locale_text: “你现在尽可以放纵。不过，等我们回到科罗努斯扩区之后，你要重新戴上你公主的面具，不要让我的名字蒙羞。”

languages.text: «Disfrute por ahora, pero, cuando volvamos a la Extensión, volverá a adoptar su disfraz de princesa para evitarme la deshonra».
languages.original_text: "Indulge yourself for now. But when we are back in the Expanse, you will return to your princess guise and not disgrace my name."

traits.locale_text: «Disfrute por ahora, pero, cuando volvamos a la Extensión, volverá a adoptar su disfraz de princesa para evitarme la deshonra».

languages.text: 「今はその立場に甘えるといい。だが、私たちがエクスパンスへ戻ったら、お前は王女の姿に戻り、私の名を汚さないでもらいたい」
languages.original_text: "Indulge yourself for now. But when we are back in the Expanse, you will return to your princess guise and not disgrace my name."

traits.locale_text: 「今はその立場に甘えるといい。だが、私たちがエクスパンスへ戻ったら、お前は王女の姿に戻り、私の名を汚さないでもらいたい」

languages.text: "Vorerst könnt Ihr gewähren. Doch wenn wir wieder in der Ausdehnung sind, gebt Ihr Euch wieder als Prinzessin aus und macht meinem Namen keine Schande."
languages.original_text: "Indulge yourself for now. But when we are back in the Expanse, you will return to your princess guise and not disgrace my name."

traits.locale_text: "Vorerst könnt Ihr gewähren. Doch wenn wir wieder in der Ausdehnung sind, gebt Ihr Euch wieder als Prinzessin aus und macht meinem Namen keine Schande."

languages.text: « Vous pouvez vous détendre pour le moment, mais dès que nous serons de retour dans les Étendues, vous reprendrez votre rôle de princesse pour ne pas déshonorer mon nom. »
languages.original_text: "Indulge yourself for now. But when we are back in the Expanse, you will return to your princess guise and not disgrace my name."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez vous détendre pour le moment, mais dès que nous serons de retour dans les Étendues, vous reprendrez votre rôle de princesse pour ne pas déshonorer mon nom. »

languages.text: "Şimdilik keyfine bak ama Enginlik'e döndüğümüzde prenses rolüne tekrar bürünecek ve ismimi kirletmeyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "Indulge yourself for now. But when we are back in the Expanse, you will return to your princess guise and not disgrace my name."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdilik keyfine bak ama Enginlik'e döndüğümüzde prenses rolüne tekrar bürünecek ve ismimi kirletmeyeceksin."
